text: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٌ فَضَحِكَتْ فَبَشَّرْنَـٰهَا بِإِسْحَـٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسْحَـٰقَ يَعْقُوبَ

translation.en.sahih: And his Wife was standing, and she smiled. Then We gave her good tidings of Isaac and after Isaac, Jacob.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan isterinya berdiri (dibalik tirai) lalu dia tersenyum, maka Kami sampaikan kepadanya berita gembira tentang (kelahiran) Ishak dan dari Ishak (akan lahir puteranya) Ya'qub.
